attributes.action: Teach Self Defence Classes in Schools for Girls
attributes.additional_details: We all know about the horrific crimes commited to Women and Children of all ages, not just in the UK but also abroad (Holidays/Working etc), and recently all the school abuse scandals that are now in the news, I think if we can start to introduce Self Defence Classes for Girls into Schools, we are offering them the help they desperately need, in doing this they will have a Better and Stronger start in life, and more Importantly SAVE LIVES.
attributes.background: Introduce Self Defense Classes for Girls into Schools from a young age to leaving school, this is something that can be taught maybe twice a week and could be included into the current school timetable.
